I have ordered almost every style of LL Bean exercise pants with pockets, but couldn’t find a pair that didn’t slide down with just sitting & standing let alone exercising. These pants are great & never slide down. Thy have pockets on each side in the front & a zippered pocket on the back waist to secure a credit card or small cell phone. The blue is a lovely color, are comfortable , and wash & dry well; I really like that they are machine dryable. I am 5’6” & the length is a little long, but due to having a cuff they look ok. I will buy these again.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: SmallColor: Dusty Blue
评论详情: I absolutely love everything about these. They're extremely comfortable, true to size, cool when warm and also block the wind and the cold. They stay in place while running, sitting, exercising, great placement of pockets, and just every day activities. Dress them up or casual, so many things I love! Now for the big BUT...they either come perfectly packaged or mostly a horrendously wrinkled, balled up SHOVED into a bag MESS!!! No joke, nearly impossible to get the wrinkles out and they look God awful that way on. I've tried everything to get them out so now I'm on the fence as far as returning them. I get that they're shipped from obviously different sellers but ZERO QA inspection. I'd be fired if my products were sent out in such a manner!!! If anything improves with the wrinkles I'll update here w/ b4 n after pics, right now I'm uncertain.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Black
评论详情: I needed pants when traveling and don’t feel comfortable in tights anymore. I bought size medium. I’m 5’ 6”, and 135 lbs. I’m 58 years old, so for those of you ladies over 55 you know weight migrates to the middle. 😜  I bought three pair (2 black, 1 navy), however each pair was different from the other. Different type of fabric, different in sizing, and different and quality of sewing. Yet all three have the same label as if manufactured in the same place.  The waist on the navy pair is 1” smaller than either of the black paír, and the fabric was not cut correctly so the seam twists around on one leg. The length on both (regular) was perfect and lands right at my ankle when standing. Pockets are deep and easily hold my iPhone 14 Pro. I washed all three in cold, delicate cycle, and hung to dry, and they wash up perfectly. No pilling, or weirdness, but one pair of black is a lovely Lycra feel, and the other is thicker and scratchy.  I’m going to order a couple more pair and see what I get. I’ll let you know.

类型: Fit Type: 25.5" Inseam PetiteSize: MediumColor: Black
评论详情: The Medium black 25.5 inseam joggers worked great on my 5’4 152lb frame - and will likely look even a bit better if I ever see sub 150 lbs again ;).  They came out the package wrinkled as all get-out, but a quick stream should take care of that. They are form fitting, but not too much and pair well with a merino wool t-shirt and cute sneakers for a semi-elevated plane travel outfit.  The are a substantial, light-weight slicker material. The black are not transparent, not too thin where you can see every bump and lump (think of that summer tech stretch material that is soooo lightweight) but definitely not an outdoor-activity winter weight. Hopefully they will be just right for cold planes!  The patch pockets are a pleasant surprise. With my hips and derrière, on seam tradition pockets tend to show through the material. These are more meant to be noticed since they sit on top of the main pant leg and I am liking that so far.  I’ll update if they don’t hold up after my first international business trip but so far, they’re on the list for summer vacay travel.

评论详情: As I put these pants on this morning, I realized that it’s rare for a short gal like me to love a pair of pants as much as I love these… thus my review. These pants are dope. The material is a great weight… not at all see through but also not likely to make you overheat as you do your thing. They have a high waist which is a nice nod to the current trend but it isn’t unflattering for those of us who lived through the high waist trend the first time. I think the best part about these pants is the length. At 5’0”, joggers typically look like genie pants on me & I usually need to fold over the waist or roll up the cuffs just to look like I’m not about to give out three wishes to whoever is next to me in the grocery line. These pants hit my ankle perfectly & look slim on my leg. All in all, I highly recommend to all the vertically challenged ladies out there!

评论概述: On the fence with this pair of pants
类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Khaki
评论详情: I was looking for some inexpensive lightweight joggers to wear hiking or while cleaning the house or yard as I've always been afraid to wear my ridiculously expensive Athleta joggers doing either. I received this pair yesterday and here are my thoughts:  Pro: 1. Color options are virtuously infinite and price point is excellent. I ordered the khaki, but was going to consider other colors if the fit was right. 2. Fabric is lightweight, but opaque, doesn't show panty lines, very stretchy, nice drape and soft to the touch, just like the Athleta joggers. 3. Lots of pockets: slant (not bulky) pockets in the front, one zippered pocket over the lumbar spine (for keys or a very tiny pet maybe? too shallow for a phone). 4. Length works for me. I am 5'2", the bottom sags some which is totally fine with me, even gives it a bit of a cool vibe. This pant should easily work for average height women, lengthwise.  (Only one) Con: 1. The waist is a tad tight. I ordered a medium which is what Amazon recommended and, while the fabric is overall very stretchy, the very top of the pants where it falls on the waist has a double seam on the inside which gives that area much less give. Picture of waist unstretched is attached. I don't think I'd exchange it for a large, that would probably be too big.  In all, I've decided to keep these and see if the waist thing becomes a non-issue later.  For reference, my natural waist is 30 inches and I wear a size 6 in Athleta joggers.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Black
Fit Type: RegularSize: XX-LargeColor: Grey Sage
评论详情: These are the best joggers!  Great for pet hair (fabric is slick so doesn’t stick), and no drawstring to bulk up under a longer shirt. I ordered a size XXL, since I don’t like snug joggers but I really could use an XL because I have to pull up a lot. I am normally a size 14 for bottoms, I weigh 203-205 and only 5’1”.  I ordered regular length since they have cuffs at bottom.  I’m going to order another color in XL.  I have worn these to work with a nice matching blouse and cardigan and I don’t think anyone notices they are joggers.  I usually spend a lot of money on joggers but at $29.99, these are just as good as those over $50.  I have washed inside out on cold about 5 times since getting them and so far, held up nicely.  I hate pilling and haven’t seen any yet.  I look every time I pull out of dryer.  One of my favorite apparel purchases on Amazon to date.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Black
评论详情: I ordered a size large in black and am typically a size 10/12  @ 5'6" tall. The fit is semi loose but not baggy. They are not really thick so I may need a layer underneath in the winter but just for around the house or running errands they are very comfortable and I like the pockets that will fit my phone if needed. I would recommend these joggers!

类型: Fit Type: 25.5" Inseam PetiteSize: MediumColor: Black
评论详情: Cute and comfortable! Bought the petite for my 5’1” frame and they are the perfect length.

类型: Fit Type: 25.5" Inseam PetiteSize: SmallColor: Navy Blue
评论详情: I’m 4’11”, 107 lbs, and the Small is a perfect fit. Probably could also wear an XS, but I didn’t want them to be skin tight. I’m 70 years old and prefer not to wear shorts anymore and these lightweight joggers are breathable and stylish as well as versatile. I just wish I would have found these before I bought several pair of the G Gradual joggers - the 7/8 length is much better. Might have to return those and order these in the same colors. Quality, fabric, high stretchy waist all get a 10/10 from me. I wish they came in more colors in the petite length. I will say though, the Army Green is hardly green at all. More of a brown, unless I got the wrong color, not sure.

类型: Fit Type: 30.5" Inseam TallSize: MediumColor: Black
评论详情: These are nice for everyday weekend wear; I am 5'10 and the tall size fits me well.  They are thin (not sweatpants material), so nice for spring. They run a bit smaller in the waist than my usual mediums but I think a large would be too big. One complaint is that the seam on one leg that should go down the inside of my leg is a little out of place--it's more in the middle/front of the leg, which rubs a little and doesn't look right.  It's not so far off that it's super noticeable, but I can see it and feel it and it annoys me.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: X-LargeColor: Dark Grey
评论详情: I ordered the recommended size based on my weight and height (L). I'm 5'2 and 138 lbs. Being an older woman, okay let's face it, old, my waist is larger than it used to be. In the Large, the waist was too tight for comfort and the hip was a little tight but it looked nice from the back. Length was good in the regular, so I was glad I didn't order the shorter length. So I returned the large and got the XL in regular length. It fits much better. Waist is comfortable and not too loose and it doesn't show my bulges in the tummy / hip area. Yet it doesn't look too big. Material is nice and stretchy. Hopefully, it will retain its nice shape and won't get too stretched out in the waist but in the meantime I am grateful for the extra room. I like the cuffs so I won't have to have my pants touching the floor when I use the plane's gross restroom. That's a bonus. And the cuffs also make it easy to assure that your pant leg isn't too long.

类型: Fit Type: 30.5" Inseam TallSize: LargeColor: Wine
评论详情: I like that you can order the length and size all the nice colors too. Thru feel soft and comfortable to do most any activity you want to do. Very stylish.

类型: Fit Type: 25.5" Inseam PetiteSize: MediumColor: Navy Blue
评论详情: It’s so difficult to find comfortable joggers on petite but these fit perfectly. Comfortable in the waste and the pockets are nice

类型: Fit Type: 25.5" Inseam PetiteSize: LargeColor: Black
评论详情: This material is perfect for days when it’s too cold for shorts but you don’t want your thickest pants. I got the short length because I’m 5’1 and the length is excellent. The waistband hits in a good spot on my stomach too. I feel like these grab in the wrong places in the crotch but nothing uncomfortable that a longer shirt can’t cover up. If they got fixed these pants would get all the stars. Great value for money especially since I got them on sale. Color (black) is great too.

类型: Fit Type: 30.5" Inseam TallSize: X-LargeColor: Khaki
评论详情: For reference, I am 5.7 1/2" and 182 pounds. The XL works well for me as it gives me a bit of room while pulling off a tapered look. The waist is not too snug, but stays in place. I ordered the tall length and am very happy with how the material drapes down my leg. Said material is not transparent and has a soft, stretchy feel to it. Also, it is not made of scuba suit material. Finally, although the reviews on this pant are somewhat mixed, this is my favorite jogger pant due to price point, fit, drape, material, and length. I have several jogger pants from different brands, just so you know.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: SmallColor: Black
评论详情: I really like these joggers. They are so comfortable and soft. I am 120 lbs. 5'1". I purchased a small, and it was fine. I could have bought a med as well. The length was perfect for me, as I bought 2 pairs. I will be buying about 3-4 more. Pocket location is perfect because it is in the appropriate place without looking bulky. And the zipper in the back is perfect for cell phone too. Great product. Will buy again!

类型: Fit Type: 30.5" Inseam TallSize: LargeColor: Khaki
评论详情: Very comfortable I’m 5’8 145 and ordered the large regular length in black They are not tight which I like the length could have been longer but still nice I ordered a large long length in this color and they are perfect for me. A medium would work but I like loose feeling

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: X-LargeColor: Black
评论详情: I ordered two pairs of these buttery soft joggers. They are great because they come in different lengths. I opted for the petites which was perfect for my 5’3” body. However, the attention to detail just isn't there. Both pairs of pants are full of bunches of threads both inside and outside of the pants. The one pair I received had very clearly been opened and returned. They were wrinkled beyond words. If you don’t mind purchasing something and then trimming the mounds of threads left behind by the manufacturer, buy these pants otherwise, move on.

类型: Fit Type: 25.5" Inseam PetiteSize: SmallColor: Army Green
评论详情: I am 5’2” 120lbs and have a hard time finding joggers that fit the way they are supposed to… these are perfect in a size small 🙌 I will definitely be ordering in more colors!
